Description_lang: Increases the damage dealt by your Hammer of the Righteous by $s1%.

description_blz.en_US: Increases the damage dealt by your Hammer of the Righteous by 10%.
description_blz.es_MX: Aumenta un 10% el daño infligido con tu Martillo del honrado.
description_blz.pt_BR: Aumenta em 10% o dano causado pelo seu Martelo do Íntegro.
description_blz.de_DE: Erhöht den von 'Hammer der Rechtschaffenen' verursachten Schaden um 10%.
description_blz.en_GB: Increases the damage dealt by your Hammer of the Righteous by 10%.
description_blz.es_ES: Aumenta un 10% el daño infligido con tu Martillo del honrado.
description_blz.fr_FR: Augmente les dégâts infligés par votre Marteau du vertueux de 10%.
description_blz.it_IT: Aumenta i danni inflitti da Martello del Virtuoso del 10%.
description_blz.ru_RU: Увеличивает урон, наносимый заклинанием "Молот праведности", на 10%.
description_blz.zh_TW: 使你的公正之錘所造成的傷害提高10%。
description_blz.zh_CN: 正义之锤造成的伤害提高10%。
